message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider offering the product for $7500?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. What do you think?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to discussing the possibility of $8000 for the product?
